about_the_game:
help Golden Jetpackman go through the levels and defeat his enemy that is setting everything on fire.
Atari 2600 style platformer


Ajude Golden Jetpackman a passar pelos levels e vencer o inimigo que pôs fogo em tudo.
Jogo estilo atari 2600
detailed_description:

name: Golden Jetpackman Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
